about_the_game:
■Overview
“HakkanShogi Matta Ari!” is a simple game in which the player only has to look for anomalies in the playing field while playing Shogi.
You can find something unusual in the course of the game,
When you find an abnormal situation, select “Hold it!".

If you select “Hold it!” even though there is nothing abnormal, it is a violation of the rules and you will have to start over from the beginning.
(The score will be recorded at this point.)

Scores will be added according to the number of turns, the number of abnormalities you found, and the number of victories or defeats in Shogi.

■Play time
10 to 20 minutes

■Video distribution guideline
You can distribute the video without permission.
Monetization is possible within the range of functions provided by video distribution sites.

■Caution
There is a certain probability that something will go wrong with each move, so the tempo is very slow and it is difficult to concentrate on playing shogi.
